s.text: Finally, I am attaching the recommendation to HBS that you wrote in 1981.
I respect you tremendously, and wherever the next part of my career may lie, I know that my search and choice will benefit significantly from your perspective.
Attachments (2) - image001.png - image002.gif - Resume of Kevin Scott.doc - Skilling HBS Recommendation.doc
Attachments (2) - image001.png - image002.gif - Resume of Kevin Scott.doc - Skilling HBS Recommendation.doc
Your historic words of support helped me keep fighting and successfully moving forward.
I have attached my resume to help bring you up to date on my career.
I have attached my resume to help bring you up to date on my career.
I have attached my resume to help bring you up to date on my career.
I have attached my resume to help bring you up to date on my career.
I found it during a profoundly challenging period in my life.
I have attached my resume to help bring you up to date on my career.
